remarks: The scalar injection function in a subring algebra is the same up to a restriction to the subring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgascl.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
subrgascl.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
subrgascl.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgascl.u $e |- U = ( I mPoly H ) $.
subrgascl.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
subrgascl.r $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
subrgascl.c $e |- C = ( algSc ` U ) $.
subrgascl $p |- ( ph -> C = ( A |` T ) ) $.
